channel.title: Thieving help!
channel.description:
I'm trying to change how much a thieving stall gives + the exp it gives, and I've found this code:
[QUOTE] break; case 2564: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 60, 100000);[/QUOTE]
This code is pretty messed up because I originally thought the 100000 was the amount of items it gave(995). My face when "You need a level of 100000 to thiev from this stall."
So what do the numbers indicate? I know what the 995 is, but not sure what the 60 and 100000 are.
I would also like to know how to change the time needed before you can click a stall again, like only being able to thiev from a staff once per hour.
Thanks :)

item.title: Thieving help!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:404115”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=501172.msg3666524#msg3666524 date=1310660202]
995 = item Id
60 = amount
100000 = level required.
Just try to mess around with it a bit.
[/quote]
Don’t think it would be like that… cause then it would give 60 coins… and i just looked at mine

the 1897 is the code for chocolate cake, 10 is the level needed to steal it, and 1 is the amount it gives…[/quote]
Well then he posted it wrong.

Read full topic

60 = amount

item.title: Thieving help!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Your right, 995 is the item id 60 is the skill requirement and 100000 is the amount of the item id it gives.

EDIT: This is my 700th post

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving help!
item.dc:creator: @polkaman polkaman
item.description:
@polkaman wrote:

I’m trying to change how much a thieving stall gives + the exp it gives, and I’ve found this code:

[QUOTE] break;
case 2564:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 60, 100000);[/QUOTE]

This code is pretty messed up because I originally thought the 100000 was the amount of items it gave(995). My face when “You need a level of 100000 to thiev from this stall.”

So what do the numbers indicate? I know what the 995 is, but not sure what the 60 and 100000 are.

I would also like to know how to change the time needed before you can click a stall again, like only being able to thiev from a staff once per hour.

Thanks

Read full topic
